key.title: key
key.description: A unique key used to retrieve in registry. For example, given `Lamb` for optimizers, it will check `OptimRegistry` and find the optimizer `apex.optim.FusedLAMB`.

params.title: params
params.description: Corresponding funcation call parameters. So the whole call is `registry.get(key)(**params)`.

database.description: A spec to load images per line for evalution database.

externalLib.title: externalLib
externalLib.description: External libraries used for training. All python files in `externalLib` will be imported as modules. In this way, you could extend registries.

hooks.title: hooks
hooks.description: Hooks used for training. Key is used to retrieve hook from `LBHash.train.hooks`.

modelEMASteps.title: modelEMASteps
modelEMASteps.description: From where we will apply EMA on model.

numReturns.title: numReturns
numReturns.description: Rank list return number of samples.

optim.description: Optimizer used for training. As for current we have `Adam` and `Lamb`.

querySet.description: A spec to load images per line for evalution query.

saveDir.title: saveDir
saveDir.description: A dir path to save model checkpoints, TensorBoard messages and logs.

schdr.description: Learning rate scheduler used for training. As for current we have `ReduceLROnPlateau`, `Exponential`, `MultiStep`, `OneCycle` and all schedulers defined in `modfire.train.lrSchedulers`.

trainSet.description: A spec to load images per line for training.

trainer.title: trainer
trainer.description: A key to retrieve from TrainerBuilder, default is `BaseTrainer`.

gpus.title: gpus
gpus.description: Number of gpus for training. This affects the `world size` of PyTorch DDP.

vRam.title: vRam
vRam.description: Minimum VRam required for each gpu. Set it to `-1` to use all gpus.

wantsMore.title: wantsMore
wantsMore.description: Set to `true` to use all visible gpus and all VRams and ignore `gpus` and `vRam`.

model.description: Model to use. Avaliable params are e.g. `backbone`, `bits` and `hashMethod`.
